steps.stepText: Right in front of where you start accept Dwarven Outfitters
Kill wolves for Dwarven Outfitters to get the 8 meat
Go back and turn in Dwarven Outfitters
Accept Simple Rune
Then accept your class Quest Coldridge Valley Mail Delivery pt.1
And also accept A New Threat
Kill 6 burly troggs and 6 rockjaw troggs for A New Threat
Go back to and turn in A New Threat
You should be Level 3 now
Go in Anvilmar and turn Simple Rune (at the Class Trainer)
Learn new Talents
Accept A Refugee's Quandary inside
Follow the road West and turn in Coldridge Valley Mail Delivery pt.1
Accept Coldridge Valley Mail Delivery pt.2
Also accept The Boar Hunter
Start killing small boars until you have all 12 for The Boar Hunter
Turn in The Boar Hunter
Run up to the end of the road on the map and turn in Coldridge Valley Mail Delivery pt.2
You should be Level 4 now
Accept Scalding Mornbrew Delivery
Use the Hearthstone
Run up into Anvilmar and turn in Scalding Mornbrew Delivery
Accept Bring Back the Mug
Learn new Talents
Run right back and turn in Bring Back the Mug
Then accept The Troll Cave there
Got to the camps and grab Felix's Tools for A Refugee's Quandary
Kill the trolls in and out of it until you complete The Troll Cave
Run back and turn in The Troll Cave
Accept The Stolen Journal
You should be Level 5 now
Go in the cave kill Grik'nir the Cold for The Stolen Journal
Return and turn in The Stolen Journal
Accept Senir's Observations pt.1
Turn in A Refugee's Quandary on the way to the tunnel
Turn in Senir's Observations pt.1 once there
Accept Senir's Observations pt.2
Also accept Supplies to Tannok
Grind your way through the tunnel (and maybe a few boars afterwards)
You should be Level 6 now
Once in Kharanos turn in Senir's Observations pt.2
Up ahead on the right, in front of the Inn, accept Beer Basted Boar Ribs
Go in the Inn and turn in Supplies to Tannok
Go to the Innkeeper and make Kharanos your home
Purchase the Rhapsody malt for Beer Basted Boar Ribs
Just outside the Inn, turn in Beer Basted Boar Ribs
Go across the road from the Inn and accept Tools For Steelgrill
Purchase a better Weapon (4-5s)
Go the Gnome-Mount seller and accept Stocking Jetsteam
Accept Ammo For Rumbleshot
And also accept The Grizzled Den
Go to the left house and turn in Tools For Steelgrill
Go to the small camp near the Cave and open the box for Ammo For Rumbleshot
Kill boars and bears until you finish Stocking Jetsteam
Kill wendingos until you get 8 manes for The Grizzled Den
Now head out and turn in Ammo For Rumbleshot
Hearth back to Kharanos
Learn new Profession: Cooking 1s
Learn new Talents
You should be Level 7 now
Turn in Stocking Jetsteam
Also turn in The Grizzled Den
Accept Evershine
Go to the Gnome house NE of the Inn and accept Operation Recombobulation
Run to Evershine and grind on the way
Turn in Evershine
Accept A Favor For Evershine
Accept The Perfect Stout
Accept Bitter Rivals as well
To the North/NE from here you’ll find tons of bears, leopards, and boars to kill for A Favor For Evershine
You should be Level 8 now
Kill troll seers and open baskets on top of the hill for The Perfect Stout
Die so you end up in Kharanos
Accept Frostmane Hold
Also accept Rejold's New Brew
Go into the Inn and buy a thunder ale off the Innkeeper and down in the basement, give the ale to Jarven Thunderbrew. When he leaves touch the barrel to turn in Bitter Rivals
Accept Return to Marleth
Go west to Brewnall village and turn in The Perfect Stout
Then turn in A Favor For Evershine
And finally turn in Rejold's New Brew
Accept Return to Bellowfiz
Accept Shimmer Stout
Next to him turn in Return to Marleth
Go west of Brewnall and kill leper gnomes until you complete Operation Recombobulation
You should be Level 9 now
Go enter the cave kill 5 headhunters and explore the cave for Frostmane Hold
Die so you end up at Kharanos
Turn in Frostmane Hold
Accept The Reports
Go NW in the house and turn in Operation Recombobulation
Travel to Ironforge
Get the IF Flightpoint
Learn new Profession: Skinning: ~1s for Skill and Knife
Learn new Profession: Mining: ~1s for Skill and Pickaxe
Go to the kings room, turn in The Reports
Now travel back and turn in Return to Bellowfiz
Grind your way to the querry, east in Dun Morogh
You should be Level 10 now
At the querry accept The Public Servant
And also accept Those Blasted Troggs!
Go in the pit below and kill the troggs here and in the cave for Those Blasted Troggs!
Gather the items for The Public Servant
Turn in The Public Servant
Then turn in Those Blasted Troggs!
Follow the path into Loch Modan and turn in Shimmer Stout on the way
Accept Stout to Kadrell

steps.questName: In Defense of the King's Lands
steps.stepText: At the first Tower in Loch Modan accept In Defense of the King's Lands
Also accept The Trogg Threat

steps.questName: In Defense of the King's Lands
steps.stepText: Kill troggs for In Defense of the King's Lands
Kill troggs for The Trogg Threat

steps.questName: In Defense of the King's Lands
steps.stepText: Go back to the tower and turn in In Defense of the King's Lands
Also turn in The Trogg Threat
Go to Thelsamar and grab the Flightpoint in Loch Modan
Look for the wandering guard and accept Rat Catching
Also accept Mountaineer Stormepikes Task
In the Inn accpet Thelsamar Blood Sausages
Kill Boars, Bears and Spiders for Thelsamar Blood Sausages
You should be Level 11 now
Kill Tunnel Rats for Rat Catching
Turn them both in
Grind your way to the North Tower
Turn in Mountaineer Stormepikes Task
Accept Stormepikes Orders
Hearth back to IF
Learn new Weapon skills: 2H Maces 10s
Learn new Talents
Take the tram down to Stromwind and get the Flightpoint
Learn new Weapon skills: 2H Swords 10s
Turn in Stormepikes Orders
Fly back to Loch Modan
You should be Level 12 now or close to it
Go north through the Wetlands to Menethil, then boat to Auberdine from here
Run out on the docks of Auberdine and grab For Love Eternal
Go upstairs accept Buzzbox 827
Accept Cave Mushrooms in front of the Inn
Accept The Red Crystal also in front of the Inn
Set your Hearthstone (if not Pala. There is no Pala trainer in Darnassus so keep IF)
Get the Flightpoint
Then grab Washed Ashore pt.1 right in front of you
Buy some 6 slot bags if you haven’t found 3 by now
Grab Bashal'Aran pt.1
Accept Tools of the Highborne
Go south over the bridge and accept Plagued Lands
Run inside to grab How Big a Threat? pt.1
Go do Washed Ashore pt.1
Grind down the shore to the beached Sea Creature to get Crawler legs for Buzzbox 827
Turn in Buzzbox 827
Also turn in Washed Ashore pt.1
Accept Buzzbox 411
Accept Washed Ashore pt.2
Do Washed Ashore pt.2 underwater next to a little island, south of boat dock
Kill Threshers for Buzzbox 411 north of the dock
Go back to Auberdine and turn in Washed Ashore pt.2
Now walk up the north shore and accept Beached Sea Creature on the way
Turn in Buzzbox 411
Accept Buzzbox 323
Walk in the forest and tame a Rapid Thistle Bear (trap in inventory) for Plagued Lands
Turn in Bashal'Aran pt.1 and grind cats along the way
Kill grells around him for earrings
Turn in Bashal'Aran pt.2
Accept Bashal’Aran pt.3
Do Bashal’Aran pt.3 by killing satyr’s
Turn it in and accept Bashal’Aran pt.4
Grind to The Red Crystal directly east of Auberdine behind the Moonkins
Grind to find the camp for How Big a Threat? pt.1 directly south of Auberdine
Run down to Ameth’Aran and accept The Fall of Ameth'Aran
Get Highborne Relics from the ghosts for Tools of the Highborne
Also read the Fall and the Lay Stones for The Fall of Ameth'Aran
And find the ghost for For Love Eternal. She’s lvl 16 but easy
Destroy the Flame for Bashal’Aran pt.4
Turn in The Fall of Ameth'Aran
Grind your way back to Auberdine
Turn in Plagued Lands at the first house
Accept Cleansing the Infected
Go inside and hand in How Big a Threat? pt.1
Accept How Big a Threat? pt.2
Also accept Thundris Windweaver
Go Upstairs accept The Tower of Althalaxx pt.1
Go in the merchant house to turn in Tools of the Highborne
Turn in Thundris Windweaver as well
Accept The Cliffspring River
Turn in The Red Crystal near the Inn
Accept As Water Cascades
Fill the Vial in the Moonwell for As Water Cascades
Turn in For Love Eternal
Turn in Beached Sea Creature
You should be 14 by now
Take the opposite boat you came with, to Rut’theran
Get the Flightpoint
Beam up to Darnassus and also get the Flightpoint
Accept the quest Trouble In Darkshore from Chief Archaeologist Greywhisker
Learn new Talents
Pala: Hearth back to IF, learn new Talents and do the Resurrection Class Quest
Make your way back to Auberdine
Turn in Bashal’Aran pt.4
Kill 20 Rabid Thistle Bears
Now head for The Cliffspring River and collect the sample next to the waterfall
Got to the coast and accept the next Beached Sea Turtle
If your lucky with the cat drops do the last two Buzzbox quests
Otherwise just grind 40-50 mods
Go to the Cave up the river and do Cave Mushrooms (Hard to do alone because of the final groups)
You should be 15 by now
Head south and turn in As Water Cascades at the red Crystal
Accept The Fragments Within
Grind your way south and kill the Furbolgs for How Big a Threat? pt.2
Head south on the beach and grab Beached Sea Turtle
Follow the shore further and accept the next Beached Sea Creature
Grind over to get another Beached Sea Creature
Hearth back to Auberdine
Turn in all Beached creature quests at the hippograph dock
Go below the dock grab Fruit of the Sea
Turn in Cave Mushrooms in front of the Inn
Turn in The Fragments Within in front of the Inn
Accept The Absent Minded Prospector
Go to the merchant house turn in The Cliffspring River
Accept The Blackwood Corrupted
Turn in Cleansing the Infected
Turn in How Big a Threat? pt.2
Accept Tharnariun's Hope
Also accept A Lost Master
Fill the Cleansing Bowl at the Moonwell
You should be 16 now
Fly to Darnassus get new skills
Do The Blackwood Corrupted. Clear all 3 pick ups or the Xabraxxis spawn will give adds (Hard to do solo)
Go do Tharnariun's Hope (den mother) If you can’t kill her with the lvl 9 adds, kill them off and run till she’s alone (Hard to do solo)
Instead of those quest you can also just grind another 40-50 mobs (Might be faster)
Go north and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx pt.1
Accept The Tower of Althalaxx pt.2
Kill any mob around the tower, NOT in it.
Hand in The Tower of Althalaxx pt.2
Accept The Tower of Althalaxx pt.3
Run out to the beach and grab the Beached Sea Creature
Do Fruit of the Sea from crawlers around here
Go back to Auberdine
Turn in Beached Sea Creature on the dock
Turn in Fruit of the Sea under the dock
Turn in The Blackwood Corrupted in the merchant house
Turn in Tharnariun's Hope at the last house
You should be Level 17 now
Go back to IF (Get on the boat to Menethil Harbor)
Fly to Loch Modan
Go to the north Tower in Loch Modan and accept Filthy Paws
Run into the Cave and do Filthy Paws. Boxes are on the ground
Then turn it back in
Grind south to Thelsamar
Grab Ironband's Excavation in the last house on the right
Grind around the Loch and turn in Ironband's Excavation
Accept Gathering Idols
Also accept Excavation Progress Report
Do Gathering Idols behind here
Turn Gathering Idols back in
Grind your way behind the excavation site to the houses (Hunter Lounge)
Turn right when you enter and get Crocolisk Hunting (behind hunter trainer)
Then go to the other side and grab A Hunter's Boast (Timed!)
Go do A Hunter's Boast. Birds are in front of the house
Turn in A Hunter's Boast
Accept A Hunter's Challenge (Also Timed!)
Do A Hunter's Challenge. mobs are more north and towards the loch
Turn in A Hunter's Challenge
Go down to the Loch and accept Bingles' Missing Supplies (Requieries pre-quest Find Bingles from Gnoarn in Ironforge)
Do Crocolisk Hunting here on the shore and the island
Grab all the parts for Bingles' Missing Supplies on the big island towards the damm
Run up to the damm from the west side and accept A Dark Threat Looms pt.1
Go out the east entrance and turn A Dark Threat Looms pt.1 in, on the barrel guarded by 2 sappers
Accept A Dark Threat Looms pt.2
Turn in A Dark Threat Looms pt.2 back on the damm
Go and Turn in Bingles' Missing Supplies
Run back to the Hunter Lounge and turn in Crocolisk Hunting
Grind your way around the Loch
Turn in Excavation Progress Report in Thelsamar
You should be Level 18 now
Accept Report to Ironforge
Make your way to Ironforge
Train talents
Train Professions
Turn in Report to Ironforge in the Hall of the Explorers (skip Powder to Ironband)
Fly down to Stormwind
Run towards Elwynn Forest and enter Redridge Mountains
Accept Encroaching Gnolls from the patrol
Turn in Encroaching Gnolls
Accept Assessing the Threat
Get Flight Point
Cross the bridge, on the right accept Blackrock Menace
And on the left accept Everstill Bridge (SKIP Elmore's Task and The Price of Shoes)
Accept Hilary's Necklace on the dock
Accept Selling Fish near the shed out front
Go in the Inn and accept A Free Lunch (SKIP Dry Times)
Go up the hill to the last two houses and accept Redridge Goulash
Get Great Goretusk Snouts just west of the houses (watch out for bellygrub we’ll get him later) for Redridge Goulash
Then head toward the lake (north shore) to get The Lost Tools
Also do Selling Fish there, by killing murlocs
Keep an eye out for a glinting mud pile underwater for Hilary's Necklace
Save at least 8 murloc fins for a later quest
Turn in The Lost Tools by the bridge
Accept The Everstill Bridge
Turn in Hilary's Necklace on the dock
Turn in Selling Fish by the shed in front of the houses
Turn in A Free Lunch
Accept Visit the Herbalist
Go north/east and kill spiders and condors for Redridge Goulash
Turn in Assessing the Threat near the Flightpoint
Accept Murloc Poachers in front of the shed
Stop at the house just west of Lakeshire, turn in Visit the Herbalist
Accept Delivering Daffodils
Go to the next house, turn in Redridge Goulash
Go in the Inn and turn in Delivering Daffodils
Kill Murlocs east of the bridge for Murloc Poachers
Kill Gnolls north of Lakeshire for The Everstill Bridge
Turn in The Everstill Bridge next to the Bridge
Turn in Murloc Poachers in front of the shed
You should be Level 20 now (and at least half way to 21)
Now fly back to Stormwind
Get your new Skills
Go to the Dwarven District and accepted Collecting Memories
Also accept Oh Brother. . .
And finally accept Underground Assault (The other 2 DM Quests are from a chain in Westfall)
Go over to Sentinel Hill in Westfall (LFG in SW and in Westfall on the way)
Get the Flightpoint
Make your way down to Moonbrook and enter the Deadmines
Fly back to Stormwind
Turn in Collecting Memories
Turn in Oh Brother. . .
And finally turn in Underground Assault
Hearth back to Auberdine
Make sure you accepted Onu
Make sure you also accepted The Absent Minded Prospector pt.1
You also need The Tower of Althalaxx pt.3
Go down south and turn in Onu
Accept The Master's Glaive
Go down the pit. It should say you found Master's Glaive (complete). Now use the phial of scrying
Click it turn in The Master's Glaive
Accept The Twilight Camp
Click the Book to turn in The Twilight Camp
Accept Return to Onu
Accept Therylune's Escape
Do the escort quest Therylune's Escape
Turn in The Absent Minded Prospector pt.1
Accept The Absent Minded Prospector pt.2
Do The Absent Minded Prospector pt.2, if someone can help
Go west and accept both Beached Sea Turtle quests
Go back and turn in Return to Onu
Accept Mathystra Relics
Accept The Sleeper Has Awakened (escort) the sleeping bear behind Onu. Hotbar his horn because he falls asleep every minute or so
This quest will bring you into Ashenvale
Run to Maestras Post in Ashenvale, and this will complete The Sleeper Has Awakened
Go turn in The Sleeper Has Awakened straight ahead in the house
Accept Bathran's Hair
Kill mobs around the ruins of OrdilAran for The Tower of Althalaxx pt.4. Then clear the camp a total of 4 times (even if you find it)
Grab plant bundles for Bathran's Hair in Bathrans Haunt
Go back to Maestras Post and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx pt.4
Accept The Tower of Althalaxx pt.5
Turn in Bathran's Hair
Accept Orendil's Cure
Turn in Therylune's Escape
Run into Astranaar and get Flightpoint
Accept The Zoram Strand right as you enter town
Accept On Guard in Stonetalon pt.1 on the house to the right
Accept Journey to Stonetalon Peak
In the Inn accept Raene's Cleansing pt.1
Also there accept Culling the Threat
Make Astranaar your home
Turn in Orendil's Cure at the last house
Accept Elune's Tear
Grind your way to The Zoram Strand up north
Stop there and accept The Ancient Statuette
Do The Zoram Strand. Naga all around here
Also do The Ancient Statuette (Its on the ground a bit north)
Turn in The Ancient Statuette
Accept Ruuzel
Kill Ruuzel at the island up north (Carefull: Has 3-4 Adds)
Turn in Ruuzel
Turn in Raene's Cleansing at the small lake
Accept Raenes Cleansing pt.2
Kill murlocs for the gem
Hearth back to Astranaar
Turn in The Zoram Strand right as you enter town
Accept Pridewings of Stonetalon
Go to the Inn Turn in Raenes Cleansing pt.2
Accept Raenes Cleansing pt.3
Accept An Aggressive Defense
Grind up the river east of Astranaar to the lake
Grab Elune's Tear
Then grind north to turn in Raenes Cleansing pt.3
Accept Raenes Cleansing pt.4
You should already be Level 22 by now
Go and do An Aggressive Defense
Make your way back to Astranaar
Turn in An Aggressive Defense
Go to the east exit house and turn in Elune's Tear
Accept The Ruins of Stardust
Exit Astranaar out the east exit follow the south path and grab stardust covered bushes for The Ruins of Stardust
Grind east to Talondeep path (heading to Stonetalon Mountains)
Run down Stonetalon to the goblin hut and accept Super Reaper 6000
Then turn in On Guard in Stonetalon pt.1
Accept On Guard in Stonetalon pt.2
Turn in On Guard in Stonetalon pt.2 right behind you
Accept A Gnomes Respite
Kill Loggers and Deforesters for A Gnomes Respite
Kill Operators for Super Reaper 6000 all around Windshear Crag
Turn in Super Reaper 6000 at the hut (SKIP Further Instructions)
Then go and turn in A Gnomes Respite
Accept An Old Colleague
Also accept A Scroll From Mauren
Stop at Mirkfallon Lake and kill Pridewings for Pridewings of Stonetalon south and east of it
You should be Level 23 by now (Or get it with the next Quest turn-in)
Run north and turn in Journey to Stonetalon Peak (SKIP Reclaiming The Charred Vale for now)
Grab the Flightpoint and fly to Auberdine
Turn in Both Beached Sea Turtle quests on the dock
Make Auberdine your home
Turn in The Absent Minded Prospector pt.2 just outside the merchant house
Accept The Absent Minded Prospector pt.3
Go in the last house accept A Lost Master
Fly to Darnassus and turn in The Absent Minded Prospector pt.3 outside the Temple of the Moon
Accept The Absent Minded Prospector pt.4
Get talents if you need them
Fly back to Auberdine
Go and do Mathystra Relics (The relics are all over)
Stop and accept Gyromast's Retrieval
Kill raging reef crawlers around here and Murlocs north near the ship
Run north of Ruins of Mathystra killing sires and matriachs for A Lost Master
Also kill Foreststriders for Gyromast's Retrieval
Turn in Gyromast's Retrieval
Accept Gyromast's Revenge
Turn the key on The First Mate somewhere in the middle for Gyromast's Revenge. You have to kill him
Then turn in Gyromast's Revenge
Run back to Auberdine
Turn in A Lost Master pt.1 at the first house in town
Accept A Lost Master pt.2
Run down and turn in Mathystra Relics
Run down and do /wave at Grimclaw Hell point southwest at the cave for A Lost Master pt.2
Go to it and turn in A Lost Master pt.2
Accept Escape Through Force
Run back to Grimclaw with him, for Escape Through Force
Grind until you level
You should be Level 24 now
Hearth to Auberdine
Turn in Escape Through Force at the house before exiting town
Accept Trek to Ashenvale
Fly to Darnassus
Get new skills
Fly to Astranaar
Turn in Trek to Ashenvale right in front of you
Run to the house on the East side, turn in The Ruins of Stardust
Accept Fallen Sky Lake
Run to the West side of town, turn in Pridewings of Stonetalon
Accept Kayneth Stillwind
Grind every mob down into Fire Scar Shrine and kill Ilkruk Mathrull for The Tower of Althalaxx pt.5 Take him out as fast as you can He summons 2 voidwalkers if you take too long
Kill Dal Bloodclaw for Culling the Threat
Grind furbolgs until half way to 25
Then run to Maestras Post and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx pt.5
Accept The Tower of Althalaxx pt.6
Accept Supplies to Auberdine (escort)
May seem out of the way, you run into a fight of 4, and 2 fights of 3 You only go to the darkshore border and it completes. Turn it back in
Make your way back to Astranaar
Turn in Culling the Threat at the inn
Run down to Silverwing Refuge and accept Elemental Bracers
Do Elemental Bracers in the lake here (Once you have all 5 inact bracers, use the scroll on them)
Then hand Elemental Bracers back in (SKIP Mage Summoner)
Grind to 25 on the elementals
You should be Level 25 now
Hearth to Auberdine
Get on the boat to Menethil Harbor
Stop at the end of the docks, accept Claws From the Deep
On the west side of town accept Young Crocolisk Skins
Go to the top of the castle, accept War Banners
On the east side of town accept Digging Through the Ooze
In front of the Inn accept The Third Fleet
Also accept The Greenwarden there
Turn in Raenes Cleansing pt.3
Accept Raenes Cleansing pt.4
Make Menethil Harbor your home
Go upstairs in the inn, turn in The Absent Minded Prospector pt.4
Accept The Absent Minded Prospector pt.5
Buy a Flagon of Mead from the bartender for The Third Fleet and give it to the guy outside the inn
Accept The Cursed Crew

steps.questName: In Search of the Excavation Team
steps.stepText: On the bridge accept In Search of the Excavation Team pt.1
Kill Young Crocolisks just east of the bridge and north on the land of the lake also along the road to the greenwarden for Young Crocolisk Skins
Kill Bluegill Murlocs and Gobbler for Claws From the Deep
Kill Mottled Raptors and Screechers for The Absent Minded Prospector pt.5
Enter the Excavation Site. Run up the path on the left and grab the fossil near the 2 npcs for The Absent Minded Prospector pt.5

steps.questName: In Search of the Excavation Team
steps.stepText: Turn in In Search of the Excavation Team pt.1

steps.questName: In Search of the Excavation Team
steps.stepText: Accept In Search of the Excavation Team pt.2
Accept Uncovering the Past
Outside the cave accept Ormer s Revenge pt.1
Go back to where you killed the raptors a few minutes ago and do Ormer's Revenge pt.1 by killing mottled raptors and screechers
Run back up to the cave and turn in Ormer's Revenge pt.1
Accept Ormers Revenge pt.2
Now do Ormers Revenge pt.2 by killing Scythclaw and Razormaw Raptors below
Gather the relics for Uncovering the Past
Go back up and turn in Ormers Revenge pt.2
Accept Ormers Revenge pt.3
Turn in Uncovering the Past
Do Ormers Revenge pt.3 atop the hill. Sarltooth is a 29 But hes as easy as the others
Go turn Ormers Revenge pt.3 back in
Go in to Angerfang Encampment and gather War Banners
Stop and accept Daily Delivery
Run straight East from here and turn in The Greenwarden
Accept Tramping Paws
Kill Mosshide for Tramping Paws at the camp
Turn Tramping Paws back in
Accept Fire Taboo
You should be Level 26 by now
Do Fire Taboo by killing any mosshides but the ones you just killed
Turn in Fire Taboo
Accept Blisters on the Land
Now Blisters on the Land is one of those quests you just do as you go Fen Creepers are stealthed elementals that lurk in the water If you see one, kill it
Hearth back to Menethil Harbor
Turn in The Absent Minded Prospector pt.5 2nd floor of the Inn
Go inside the castle upstairs, turn in War Banners
Accept Nek'Rosh's Gambit
On the west side of town hand in Daily Delivery
Also turn in Young Crocolisk Skins
Accept Apprentice's Duties
Go on the dock and turn in Claws From the Deep
Accept Reclaiming Goods

steps.questName: In Search of the Excavation Team
steps.stepText: On the bridge hand in In Search of the Excavation Team pt.2
Touch the damaged crate and turn in Reclaiming Goods
Accept The Search Continues
Go just north to the next camp Touch the sealed barrel and turn in The Search Continues
Accept Search More Hovels
Go north again touch the half burried barrel and turn in Search More Hovels
Accept Return the Statuette
Stop at the sunken ships and kill the unded on either ship for The Cursed Crew
Try to stay on top of the ships. Kill Snellig in the broken part of the first ship in the rear near the shore for the box
From here north you should be able to find Giant crocolisks to kill for Apprentice's Duties as well as the fen dwellers
Head toward Ironbeards Tomb for Digging Through the Ooze. Kill oozes for the bag
Now once all your fen creepers for Blisters on the Land are dead head back to the greenwarden and hand it in
Hearth Back to Menethil Harbor
Just outside hand in The Cursed Crew
Accept Lifting the Curse
Go north a little bit and hand in Digging Through the Ooze
Go to the west side of town, turn in Apprentice's Duties
Next down to the docks, hand in Return the Statuette
You should be Level 27 now
Fly to IF and get new skills
Hand in An Old Colleague (SKIP the next part)
Fly to SW, hand in A Gnomes Respite (SKIP the next part)
Fly to Lakeshire
Accept Blackrock Bounty right in front of FP near bridge
Accept Blackrock Menace just over bridge on right
Go in the town hall, accept Solomon's Law
Accept Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore Outside the Inn on the wall
Make Lakeshire your home
Just west of town at the house past the inn, accept An Unwelcome Guest
Now go kill Bellygrub for An Unwelcome Guest
Then hand it back in
Go to Renders Camp and kill the orcs here for Blackrock Menace
Once at the cave kill get axes and champions for Blackrock Bounty. Go left when you go in towards the down area with water, there is an escort quest here
You should have your axes and champions killed by the time you get to the escort.
Get the escort quest Missing In Action in the cave and escort him out. Hes a 25 elite so he wont die easy
Once youre out of the camp he starts running back to Lakeshire
Turn the quest Missing In Action in right where you stop
Turn in Blackrock Menace as well (SKIP Tharil'Zun)
Run over the Bridge near the Flightpoint to turn in Blackrock Bounty
Kill the Gnolls all the way north/east for Solomon's Law
Keep an eye out for Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore
Hearth to Lakeshire
Go in the town hall and turn in Solomon's Law
Also turn in Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore
You should be Level 28 now
Run down to the SW corner of Redredge Mountains, and take the path that forks south into Duskwood
Follow the road until you get to Darkshire and get Flightpoint
In Darkshire accept Crime and Punishment in the main House (Start LFG)
Fly back to Lakeshire
Accept What Comes Around... from the Guard in front of the Inn
Now fly to SW (and finish LFG)
Accept The Color of Blood in the Old Town
Accept Quell The Uprising right in front of the Stockades
Enter the Stockade
Turn in all the Quests where you got them
Fly to Darkshire and continue questing
Note on Duskwood: It has a few long, pointless chains that you only do a few parts of, then SKIP the rest
Go to the house just south of FP and accept Look to the Stars pt.1
Buy a bronze tube from the gnome engineer just south of here and hand Look to the Stars pt.1 back in
Accept Look to the Stars pt.2
At the first big house on the left outside accept Worgen in the Woods pt.1
Go in the house and accept Raven Hill
