Prepare for a few badlands quests by buying a frost oil and a gyrochronatom (dont by a gyro if you cant find a frost oil)
Also buy a healing potion and lesser invisibility potion. Again dont get either of the potions if you cant get a frost oil or gyro.
Fly to Loch Modan
Make Thelsamar your home
Go in the house behind the Inn and accept Badlands Reagent Run
Accept Find Agmond
Run down into the Badlands
Go accept Fiery Blaze Enchantment
Accept Mirages
Also accept A Dwarf and His Tools
Stop and hand in Martek the Exiled
Accept Indurium
Accept Barbecued Buzzard Wings
Only accept Pearl Diving if you have them
Now there is only one area for Barbecued Buzzard Wings. So fort he 2 quests that require their items, kill them whenever you see one.
Go and accept Study of the Elements: Rock pt.1
Also accept Coolant Heads Prevail
Then turn Coolant Heads Prevail back in
Accept Gyro What?
Then turn Gyro What? back in.
Accept Liquid Stone
Then turn Liquid Stone right back in
Grind down and open the crate for Mirages
Grind over to the dig site
Kill the dwarfs for A Dwarf and His Tools
On the right side of the hole touch the note in the tent for A Sign of Hope
Grind up again and hand in Mirages
Accept Scrounging
Then turn in A Dwarf and His Tools
And also turn in A Sign of Hope
Accept the next part to Uldaman
Grind down and accept Tremors of the Earth
The ogres wander around so kill them if you see them. The boss is easy to pull off the back, with the small add or none.
Go south and kill ogres here for Scrounging and hopefully the boss is here.
Grind back and turn in Find Agmond
Accept Murdaloc
Go just south to the gnoll camp and do Murdaloc
Also do Indurium there
Go up and turn in Barbecued Buzzard Wings
Also turn in Indurium
Accept News for Fizzle
Kill the lesser rock elementals for Study of the Elements: Rock pt.1
Also finish Badlands Reagent Run there
Go back and turn in Study of the Elements: Rock pt.1
Accept Study of the Elements: Rock pt.2
Do Study of the Elements: Rock pt.2 by killing rock elementals
Go back and turn in Study of the Elements: Rock pt.2
Accept Study of the Elements: Rock pt.3
Kill buzzards and coyotes for Badlands Reagent Run if you still need them
Grind down and kill ogres for Scrounging
Kill greater rock elementals for Study of the Elements: Rock
Go back to turn in Study of the Elements: Rock pt.3

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Accept This Is Going To Be Hard pt.1

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Turn around and hand in This Is Going To Be Hard pt.1

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Accept This Is Going To Be Hard pt.2

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Turn around again and hand in This Is Going To Be Hard pt.2

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Accept This Is Going To Be Hard pt.3

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Kill the elemental that gets summoned for This Is Going To Be Hard pt.3 (hes 45)

steps.questName: This Is Going To Be Hard
steps.stepText: Then turn This Is Going To Be Hard pt.3 back in to get your Nifty Stopwatch
Go and turn in Scrounging
Go and turn in Tremors of the Earth (SKIP the next part)
You should be Level 41 now
Hearth to Thelsamar
Go in the house behind the Inn and turn in Badlands Reagent Run
Accept the Uldaman part
Run over and turn in Murdaloc
Accept the Uldaman part
Fly to Duskwood
Make it your home
Fly to Stormwind
Go and accept In Search of The Temple
Fly back to Duskwood
Run into Swamp of Sorrows
Go and kill the whelps for Dream Dust In the Swamp (Low droprate but they respawn fast)
Accept Enroaching Wildlife
Kill the 3 mob types for Enroaching Wildlife around him and north. Its all close to the quest giver
Go up and find Noboru the Cudgel. He circles around and drops an item that starts Noboru the Cudgel
Go back and turn in Enroaching Wildlife
Accept The Lost Caravan
Grind over and turn in Noboru the Cudgel
Accept Draenethyst Crystals
Go up to the sanctuary and start collecting the Draenethyst Crystals
When you get to the last camp with the npc in the cage first grab the chest off the cart to the left for The Lost Caravan
Make sure you clear the camp beside the caged guy
Then accept Galens Escape its a breeze if you cleared the camp
Grind down to the busted up looking tent and open the chest to complete Galens Escape
Go back and turn in Draenethyst Crystals
Go and turn in The Lost Caravan
Accept Driftwood
Run through the swamp and go south into the Blasted Lands over to Nethergarde Keep.
Grab the Flightpoint and fly to Darkshire.
Grab Supplies for Nethergarde on your way back NE
Fly back to Nethergarde
Turn in Supplies for Nethergarde
Run back up into the Swamp of Sorrows.
Run up to the lake around the Sunken Temple and you should get a complete message for In Search of The Temple
Go and start killing silt and monstrous crawlers and work your way south for and bugs until its done.
Also look for wood planks on the ground for Driftwood
Hearth to Darkshire
Fly to Nethergarde and run back up into the swamp
Turn in Driftwood
Accept Deliver the Shipment
Run down into the Blasted Lands and turn in Deliver the Shipment
Fly to BB
Turn in Dream Dust In the Swamp atop the Inn
Accept Rumors for Kravel
Get on the ship to Rachet and fly to Theramore
Turn in and bugs at the Inn
Fly to Desolace
Make Nijels Point your home
Accept Down the Scarlet Path
Go down accept Reagents For Reclaimers Inc pt.3
Run over and accept Ghost-O-Plasm Round Up
Kill the demons for Reagents For Reclaimers Inc pt.3
Kill undead ravagers for Down the Scarlet Path
Do Ghost-O-Plasm Round Up between the 2 skeletons in the middle
You should be Level 42 now
Go back and turn in Ghost-O-Plasm Round Up
Hearth to Nijels Point
Turn in Down the Scarlet Path (SKIP the next part)
Go just south of the Inn, turn in Reagents For Reclaimers Inc pt.3
Accept Reagents For Reclaimers Inc pt.4
Fly to Theramore, Boat to Menethil
Fly to IF
Turn in Reagents For Reclaimers Inc pt.4
Get new skills
Fly to Booty Bay
Go into the Inn, accept Tran'Rek
Make BB your home
Accept Zanzil's Secret
Also accept Whiskey Slim's Lost Grog
Go near the Bank, accept Akiris By the Bundle pt.1
Go in the house next to the half ship, accept Stoley's Debt
Where the dock forks up and down, go up and around the corner, accept Keep An Eye Out
Go out of BB and to the right and south. Kill the buccaneers for Up To Snuff
Also to Keep An Eye Out there
Kill the swashbucklers around the two camps (bloodsail charts are here on the box and bloodsail orders, on the box, NE tent) for The Bloodsail Buccaneers pt.4
Run back up into BB, and turn left
Turn in Keep An Eye Out near the forge
Go up in the Inn, turn in Up To Snuff
Go just outside and hand in The Bloodsail Buccaneers pt.4
Accept The Bloodsail Buccaneers pt.5
Go kill naga for Akiris By the Bundle pt.1
Grind on the nagas until youre at least 50% into 43
Go up to the Ruins of Aboraz and kill Chucky for Voodoo Dues
Also killing the mobs for Zanzil's Secret
Go up to the Ruins of Jubawal and kill Jon-Jon and Maury for Voodoo Dues
Finish the rest of Zanzil's Secret
Go kill Tethis for Raptor Mastery pt.4 behind the arena
Then turn in Raptor Mastery pt.4 at Nessingways
Accept Big Game Hunter
Go up to the rebel camp and accept Colonel Kurzen
Go to the cave to the fork and go down once like earlier kill the elites and subchiefs for Colonel Kurzen
Die on purpose so youre near the rebel camp
Go to the rebel camp and turn in Colonel Kurzen
Kill the trolls until youre about 9k from leveling
Hearth to BB
Turn in Zanzil's Secret
Go down by the Bank, turn in Akiris By the Bundle pt.1
Accept Akiris By the Bundle pt.2
Go to the house in front of the half boat, turn in Voodoo Dues
Accept Cracking Maury's Foot
Get on the boat to Rachet then fly to Theramore
Turn in Akiris By the Bundle pt.2 in front of you
Fly to Gadgetzan
Accept Wastewander Justice
Also accept Water Pouch Bounty
Make Gadget your home
Go in front of the cage and grab off the sign WANTED: Caliph Scorpidsting
Also get WANTED: Andre Firebeard from the same sign
Turn in Tran'Rek (SKIP the next part)
On the left side of town on the hill accept Gadgetzan Water Survey
Go to The Shimmering Flats and turn in Rumors for Kravel
Accept Back to Booty Bay
Just beside him turn in News for Fizzle
Go and accept Keeping Pace
Do Keeping Pace by talking with zamek just south of here. Don't follow him, run to rizzles house and when he leaves grab the unguarded plans.
Which turns in Keeping Pace
Accept Rizzle's Schematics
Turn in Rizzle's Schematics
Hearth to Gadget
Run out to Steamwheedle Port
Turn in Stoley's Debt at the southern most house
Accept Stoley's Shipment
Accept Southsea Shakedown as well
Go to the northern houses, accept Pirate Hats Ahoy!
And also accept Screecher Spirits
Go and kill the mobs for Wastewander Justice
Kill the same mobs for Water Pouch Bounty
Look for Caliph Scorpidsting and kill him for WANTED: Caliph Scorpidsting while here. He has 2 stealthed guards but is fairly easy.
Run over to the caveand go through to Lost Rigger Cove.
Start killing the mobs for Southsea Shakedown
Also do Pirate Hats Ahoy! here
Kill Andre Firebeard for WANTED: Andre Firebeard
Go to the only 2 story house out here and get the stolen wine for Stoley's Shipment. It's on the 2nd floor
Hearth to Gadget
Turn in Wastewander Justice
Accept More Wastewander Justice
Turn in WANTED: Caliph Scorpidsting
And turn in Water Pouch Bounty as well
Go west and do Gadgetzan Water Survey. Run once you get the sample a 47 and 48 attack you.
Run back to Gadget and hand in Gadgetzan Water Survey
Accept Noxious Lair Investigation
Go do More Wastewander Justice by killing the mobs
Go back up to Steamweedle Port, to the southern house and turn in Stoley's Shipment
Accept Deliver to MacKinley
Turn in WANTED: Andre Firebeard
And also turn in Southsea Shakedown
Go to the northern house, turn in Pirate Hats Ahoy!
Hearth to Gadget
Turn in More Wastewander Justice
Accept Handle With Care near the north side of town
Fly to Feralas
On the water side of the inn in the gazebo, accept The Mark of Quality
Make Feralas your home
Go into the big building across from the Inn, accept The Missing Courier pt.1
Also accept The Ruins of Solarsal
Go to the building just west accept In Search of Knowledge
And accept The High Wilderness here as well
Go upstairs turn in The Missing Courier pt.1
Accept The Missing Courier pt.2
Go to the gazebo and turn in The Ruins of Solarsal
Accept Return to Feathermoon Stronghold
Go back to Feathermoon to the big building, turn in Return to Feathermoon Stronghold
Accept Against the Hatecrest pt.1
Turn around and hand in Against the Hatecrest pt.1
Accept Against the Hatecrest pt.2
Kill naga for Against the Hatecrest pt.2
Grind to the next Level
You should be Level 44 now
Go back to Feathermoon to the big building, turn in Against the Hatecrest pt.2
Accept Against Lord Shalzaru
Go down to the cave and kill Lord Shalzaru at the end for Against Lord Shalzaru
Die so you end up at Feathermoon
Go back to Feathermoon to the big building, turn in Against Lord Shalzaru
Accept Delivering the Relic
Go to the other side of the building and turn in Delivering the Relic
Take the boat to the mainland
Go south of the dock and kill screechers for Screecher Spirits
Go down and touch the wrecked boat to turn in The Missing Courier pt.2
Accept Boat Wreckage
Hearth to Feathermoon
Go in the little building across from the Inn on the 2nd floor, turn in Boat Wreckage
Accept The Knife Revealed
Go up top of the big spiral tower, turn in The Knife Revealed
Accept Psychometric Reading
Go in the little building across form the Inn on the 2nd floor, turn in Psychometric Reading
Accept The Woodpaw Gnolls
Take the boat to the mainland
Go into the yeti cave and kill yeti's for The Mark of Quality you can skin them and it's also a drop.
If a OOX-22/FE Distress Beacon has fallen accept the quest Find OOX-22/FE!
Turn it in Find OOX-22/FE! at the back of the cave (SKIP the escort).
Grind east and kill the Brutes and warlocks and shamans for The High Wilderness
Go and accept Freedom For All Creatures It's pretty hidden, just NW of the camp entrance is a path that doesn't even look like you can walk on it.
To do Freedom For All Creatures simply escort her to the cage, open it and kill anything until it says complete.
Hand Freedom For All Creatures back in
Accept Doling Justice pt.1 The mobs can be found in this camp.
Turn Doling Justice pt.1 in
Accept Doling Justice pt.2
Go down and touch the Large Leather Backpacks on the big tree. Turn in The Woodpaw Gnolls
Accept The Writhing Deep
Right click the Backpack to accept Thalanaar Delivery
Grind down to the hive and go all the way down. Go into the southern tunnel and stay right, You'll see a Zukk'Ash Pod there.
Turn in The Writhing Deep
Accept Freed From the Hive
Hearth to Feathermoon
On the water side of the Gazebo, turn in The Mark of Quality
Accept Improved Quality
Go in the small house across from the Inn, turn in The High Wilderness
Then go upstairs and turn in Freed From the Hive
Accept A Hero's Welcome
Go to the big building next door and turn in A Hero's Welcome
Accept Rise of the Silithid
Fly out to Thalanaar and turn in Thalanaar Delivery
Fly to Rut'theran Village (Darnassus)
Follow the dock and go in the house, turn in Handle With Care
Accept Favored of Elune?
Go upstairs, turn in In Search of Knowledge
Then go to the back of the house on the 2nd floor, open the green book and accept Feralas: A History
Turn Feralas: A History back in
Accept The Borrower
You should be Level 45 now
Port up to Darnassus
Get new skills
Go to the temple of the moon and up to the 2nd floor, turn in Rise of the Silithid
Also turn in Doling Justice pt.2
Buy 2 Elixir of Fortitude for a later part of this quest
Hearth to Feathermoon
Fly to Gadgetzan and turn in The Borrower
Accept The Super Snapper FX
Now you can either grind on the gnolls in Feralas around where you found the backpack on the tree, or you can do Uldaman.

I don't list all the quests for Uldaman because there is a good handful and you don't have to do them all to fully level, and again it is optional. This is much faster than grinding would be. I really hate to do instances when trying for the best time but alliance has less quests than the horde do and I did mention there will be about 10-15% of grinding on your way to 60. If you did do all instances though you would be really slowed down. This isn't going to put a break in your time with a good group, preferrably guild groups of 45+
A great map of Uldaman and where the parts of most of the quests pieces can be done at is listed here on worldofwar.net
Once you're all set, fly to SW
Turn in In Search of The Temple
Accept In Search of The Hinterlands
Get new skills
Fly to Southshore.
Run up to the path behind Durnholde Keep into The Hinterlands
Go and turn in In Search of The Hinterlands
Accept Gryphon Master Talonaxe
Get the Flightpoint way up top
Then go in the cave and turn in Gryphon Master Talonaxe
Accept Rhapsody Shindigger
Also accept Witherbark Cages
Go into the Inn and turn right, accept Skulk Rock Clean-Up
Accept Troll Necklace Bounty as well
Go way in the back of the Inn and make Aerie Peak your home.
Grind east to the path while keeping an eye out for feathers on the ground for Favored of Elune?
Follow the path up and turn in Rhapsody Shindigger
Accept Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail
Go back down and to the troll camp and clear most of them out and open the 2 cages for Witherbark Cages
Grind east and open the 3rd cage for Witherbark Cages
You should also have 5 necklaces for Troll Necklace Bounty now
Go NE collecting feathers if you still need them on the way for Favored of Elune?
Kill the Green Sludges for Skulk Rock Clean-Up
Also kill Jade Oozes for Skulk Rock Clean-Up
Go to the waterfall and dive into the water below, then go south along this shore until you see Gammerita and take her picture for The Super Snapper FX
Also you want to keep an eye out for bottles along the shore for Whiskey Slim's Lost Grog
Hearth to Aerie Peak
Go to the front of the Inn and turn in Skulk Rock Clean-Up
Also turn in Troll Necklace Bounty and any extra 5 necklaces you have.
Go up past the Flightpoint in the cave and turn in Witherbark Cages
Accept The Altar of Zul
Go run up top of the Altar of Zul for The Altar of Zul
Now I grind on the trolls and wolves around Zul until I'm 1 bar from 47.
Get the quest Jammal'an the Prophet if you plan to do Sunken Temple later.
I'm sure by the time you near 47 you're going to find OOX-09/HL Distress Beacon
Accept Find OOX-09/HL
Turn in Find OOX-09/HL
Then accept Rescue OOX-09/HL and escort it out. Theres only 2 encounters of 3 mobs, but watch out for the stealthed wolves.
You should be Level 47 now
Hearth to Aerie Peak
Turn in any Troll Necklace Bounty you have just before you go out
Go up past FP and turn in The Altar of Zul
Accept Thadius Grimshade
Fly to Menethil Harbor and take the boat to Auberdine
Fly to Rut'theran Village
Turn in Favored of Elune?
Go upstairs, turn in The Super Snapper FX
Accept Return to Troyas
Fly to Feralas
Make Feathermoon Stronghold your home
Go across from the Inn to the 2 story house, turn in Return to Troyas
Accept The Stave of Equinex
Accept The Sunken Temple next to him
Swim or boat east to the dock.
Beside the dock accept Zapped Giants
Also accept Fuel for Zapping
Make the Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker a hotkey. Then go south along the shore and start zapping giants and killing them for Zapped Giants
Also kill water elementals for Fuel for Zapping
Go back and turn in Zapped Giants
Turn in Fuel for Zapping as well. Now he opens his store to you.

steps.questName: An Orphan Looking For A Home
steps.stepText: Run over to the grimtotem camp and accept An Orphan Looking For A Home
Go down to the yeti cave and do the robot chicken escort if you can, don't be afraid to ask for help if needed.
Kill Ironfur Bears and Groddoc Gorillas until you get 3 livers from each of them for Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail
Kill the Rage Scar Yeti's here for Improved Quality remember you can skin them for these as well.
If a Pristine Yeti Hide drops, accept the quest it gives Pristine Yeti Hide
Go to Rockbiter and accept The Giant Guardian

Get the Blytan Essence from the fire for The Stave of Equinex Get the Samha Essence from the fire atop the ruined arch. To get to it, go around back and hop up the broken rocks (it's not easily noticed). Go back out the back and Grab the Imbel Essence from the fire. Get the Lahassa Essence from the fire under the brown gazebo.
Go down to the Equinex Monolith just over the cliff. Use Troya's Staff next to it. Touch the Monolith and turn in The Stave of Equinex
Accept The Morrow Stone
Go back up near the previous flame and turn in The Giant Guardian
Accept the escort Wandering Shay
Grab the bell from the chest and hotkey it. Wandering Shay is similar to the druid quest back in darkshore.
Run her back to Rockbiter and turn in Wandering Shay
Hearth to Feathermoon Stronghold
Go to the gazebo near the water beside the hippograph master, turn in Pristine Yeti Hide
Also turn in Improved Quality here
Take your 2 Elixirs of Fortitude, go across to the 2 story house and turn in The Morrow Stone
Fly to Gadgetzan
Just inside Gadget to the right accept The Thirsty Goblin
Make Gadget your home
Go behind the Inn, accept The Dunemaul Compound
Near the north entrance, accept Thistleshrub Valley
Go south and kill Rocs for Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail If it's busy just do it later.
Ride over to turn in The Sunken Temple
Accept The Stone Circle
Also accept Gahz'Ridian
Now put on the Gahz'Ridian Detector Helm and yellow dots on mini map will show the pieces you need to get for Gahz'Ridian.
Run over west to the Dunemaul Compound clear a path and kill Gor'Marok the Ravager for The Dunemaul Compound
Head over and finish killing the ogres for The Dunemaul Compound while gathering the rest of the artifacts for Gahz'Ridian
Grind on the ogres and  gather artifacts until you're 10,000 from 48
Sneak up the left side of uldum and go up to the pedestal to turn in Seeing What Happens
Talk to the guy who appears to accept The Stone Watcher
And talk to him until The Stone Watcher is completed
Then touch the pedastal to turn The Stone Watcher back in
Touch the pedastal one more time and accept Return to Ironforge
Go west and kill Gnarled Thistlegrub and Thistlegrub Rootshapers for Thistleshrub Valley
Kill the dew collectors for The Thirsty Goblin
You should be Level 48 now
If you find Tooga, accept Tooga's Quest (He follows you, you don't have to follow him)
Go up to the noxious lair and kill centipaar there for Noxious Lair Investigation
If you can't get them all before tooga has 10 minutes left, go turn in Tooga's Quest and then come back.
Accept Yuka Screwspigot at steamwheedle port
Turn in Screecher Spirits (SKIP the ZF part)
Hearth to Gadget
Go near the entrance and accept The Thirsty Goblin
Turn The Thirsty Goblin in
Accept In Good Taste
Go behind the Inn near the fire, turn in The Dunemaul Compound
Go near the north entrance, hand in Thistleshrub Valley
Go west to Sprinkle, turn in In Good Taste
Accept Sprinkle's Secret Ingredient
In the building behind her, turn in Noxious Lair Investigation
Go on the hill behind the building, accept The Schrimshank Redemption
Run down and turn in Gahz'Ridian

Take the spiral down to the entrance that is north. first fork go right. after the circular room at the next fork go right. You will enter a big square room. Go right and grab the survey gear for The Schrimshank Redemption
Die on purpose so you end up at Gadget
Go to the hill on the west side of town, turn in The Schrimshank Redemption
Accept Insect Part Analysis pt.1
Go to the house on the NW part of town, turn in Insect Part Analysis pt.1
Accept Insect Part Analysis pt.2
Go back up on the hill, turn in Insect Part Analysis pt.2
Accept Rise of the Silithid

steps.questName: An Orphan Looking For A Home
steps.stepText: Run up to the Shimmering Flats and turn in An Orphan Looking For A Home
Accept A Short Incubation
Since you already have this, turn A Short Incubation back in

steps.questName: The Newest Member of the Family
steps.stepText: Accept The Newest Member of the Family now you have 1 hour.
Fly to Theramore and get any mageweave you have out and build up first aid as much as you can.
Boat to Menethil and fly to IF
Make IF your home
Get new skills
Go and turn in Return to Ironforge
Accept A Future Task
Also accept Passing the Burden
Turn around and turn in A Future Task
Go and turn in Passing the Burden
Accept Arcane Runes
Accept An Easy Pickup as well
Go to turn in An Easy Pickup
Accept Signal For Pickup
Then turn Signal For Pickup back in. Now you got the flare gun to signal later on.
Fly to the Hinterlands

steps.questName: The Newest Member of the Family
steps.stepText: Go in the base downstairs and turn in The Newest Member of the Family
Accept Food For Baby
Run and turn in Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail
Accept Rhapsody's Tale
Grind down to the lake
Get a Violet Tragan (Mushroom) from the bottom of the lake for Sprinkle's Secret Ingredient
Kill Silvermane Stalkers for Food For Baby
Grind back to Aerie Peak and go to the bottom floor of the Inn
Turn in Food For Baby
Accept Becoming A Parent
Then turn Becoming A Parent back in. Cute pet and good xp
Hearth to IF
Fly to BB
Go down to the first floor of the Inn, make it your home
Turn in Back To Booty Bay
And also turn in Whiskey Slim's Lost Grog
Enter the house next to the upside down half ship, turn in Deliver to MacKinley
Under that boat outside, accept Stranglethorn Fever
Go up the ramp and first house past the bridge, turn in all of the robot chicken escorts you've gotten.
Near the boat, accept The Captain's Chest
Go kill gorillas around for Stranglethorn Fever
Then go up into the cave and turn in Stranglethorn Fever.
Go and kill King Bangalash for Big Game Hunter he spawns level 33 minions.
Run and kill the elite ogres all around here until Maury's Key drops for Cracking Maury's Foot. If you don't find this after an hour just abandon the quest.
I grind till im 2 bars from 49 if I don't get the key. Usally it's about an hours worth.
Go up to Nessingways and turn in Big Game Hunter
Hearth to Booty Bay Run up to the half boat just outside the Inn
Turn in Stranglethorn Fever
You should be Level 49 now
Run to the shore just east of BB and open blue bottles until you get Carefully Folded Note which starts Message in A Bottle pt.1
Go and kill Gorlash for The Captain's Chest He's a 47 elite, it can be tough.
Go and turn in Message in A Bottle pt.1 (SKIP the next part)
Go down to the pirate ships. You want to go to the 2nd floor near the front of the ship and kill the captain of each for The Bloodsail Buccaneers pt.5
Look for a scroll on one of the ships called Cortello's Riddle which starts Cortello's Riddle pt.1
If hearth is up, use it, otherwise die so you end up at BB
Go near the boat, turn in The Captain's Chest
Go up top of the Inn, turn in The Bloodsail Buccaneers pt.5
Fly to SW
Turn in Rhapsody's Tale (SKIP the rest)
Look at the AH for a mithril casing for later in Un'Goro
Fly to Duskwood
Run east through Deadwind to the Swamp of Sorrows
Follow the road until it forks and the left fork has a bridge and under it is A Soggy Scroll which turns in Cortello's Riddle pt.1
Accept Cortello's Riddle pt.2
Run down to the Blasted Lands
No need to rush through this zone, so grind on anything you see.
Stop and accept The Basilisk's Bite
Accept Vulture's Vigor
Accept Snickerfang Jowls
Accept A Boar's Vitality
And finally accept The Decisive Striker
You're going to need the following amount of items to complete all 5 of these quests. Snickerfang Jowls:5, Blasted Boar Lungs:6, Scorpok Pincers:6, Basilisk Brain:11, Vulture Gizzards:14
Grind down and accept Everything Counts In Large Amounts
If you do find one of these, hand it back in when you pass her. Don't even bother with the other quest you'll Never find it.
Go and turn in the The Basilisk's Bite
Turn in Vulture's Vigor
Turn in Snickerfang Jowls
Turn in A Boar's Vitality
And finally turn in The Decisive Striker
Go to Nethergarde Keep to the top of the tall tower and turn in Thadius Grimshade (SKIP the next part).
Hearth to Booty Bay
Accept Zanzil's Mixture
Also accept A Fool's Stout
Get on the boat to Rachet
Accept Volcanic Activity at the first hut off the dock
Just outside this hut is a green chest, open it for The Stone Circle
Fly to Tanaris
Go near the NW entrance, turn in Sprinkle's Secret Ingredient
Accept Delivery For Marin
Go back near the South entrance and turn in Delivery For Marin
Accept Noggenfogger Elixir
Then turn Noggenfogger Elixir back in. Now you get 5 elixirs and can buy them.
Run to the Shimmering Flats and turn in Zanzil's Mixture
Also turn in A Fool's Stout
Accept Get the Goblins Drunk
Go and turn in Get the Goblins Drunk
Go back and accept Report Back to Fizzlebub
Go and turn in The Stone Circle (SKIP the rest unless you plan on doing the Sunken Temple).
If you do ZF you only really need to complete at least 2-3 of the following quests
Hearth to BB and turn in Report Back to Fizzlebub
You should be Level 50 now
Fly to IF
Get new skills
Accept the quest The Hunter's Charm
Make sure you get at least 15 silk cloths out of the mailbox or AH alt
Make IF your home
Accept Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
Fly to Thelsamar
Run down into the Badlands all the way west and enter the Searing Gorge
Go down to and touch the outhouse, accept Caught!
Go just below the outhouse and kill the geologists for Caught!
Clear all the mobs and at the bottom of the little pit, accept Suntara Stones pt.1
Escort him out and when he dies grab the note which starts Suntara Stones pt.2
Run back down near the outhouse and get the last of your geologist kills for Caught!
Turn in Caught! at the outhouse
Accept Ledger From Tanaris
Grab the book he slips you under the door.
Run down and kill Margol the Rager, and grab Margol's Horn off him which starts The Horn of the Beast (This gives you the searing gorge key)
Run over and accept Divine Retribution
Then talk to him until completed and turn in Divine Retribution
Accept The Flawless Flame
Run up to Thorium Point and get the Flightpoint
Grab quests off the sign WANTED: Overseer Maltorius (this will require a group)
Accept STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere
Accept Lookout's Spyglass
And also accept JOB OPPORTUNITY: Culling the Competition
Accept Curse These Fat Fingers
Accept Fiery Menace!

steps.questName: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
steps.stepText: And accept Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It near the tower
Under the tent accept What The Flux?
Fly to IF
Turn in Suntara Stones pt.2
Accept Dwarven Justice
Fly to Thelsamar
Run down to the Searing Gorge gate guard near southern Tower and turn in The Horn of the Beast
Accept Proof of Deed
Hearth to IF
Turn in Proof of Deed
Accept At Last!

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Go and accept A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
Fly to Thelsamar
Turn in At Last! put the key on your keyring.
From here south kill glassweb spiders for Ledger From Tanaris
Kill any golems you see over here for The Flawless Flame
Grind around the southern part of the cauldron (the pit) and circle it back towards TP
Kill heavy war golems and infernal elementals (not magma elementals) for The Flawless Flame
Kill heavy war golems for Curse These Fat Fingers
Kill dark iron lookouts and steamsmiths for STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere
Also kill them for Lookout's Spyglass
Turn in The Flawless Flame
Accept Forging the Shaft when you're near TB again.
Kill greater lava spiders (not searing) for Fiery Menace!
If the Grimesilt Outhouse Key dropped, use it to start The Key to Freedom
And turn in The Key to Freedom again
Start grinding down into the cauldron.
Kill dark iron taskmasters and slavers down here and inside the cave if you see them for JOB OPPORTUNITY: Culling the Competition
Also kill them for Forging the Shaft
Go in the cave and go through the jail bar door, turn in Dwarven Justice
Accept Release Them
Go up the ramp and stay right to kill the boss here for WANTED: Overseer Maltorius This is doable with 2 people but very tough.
Grab What The Flux? on the rail behind him.

steps.questName: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
steps.stepText: Keep following the path. You'll come to a big dead end area with lots of Incendosaur for Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
Grind until youre 36k from leveling
Die on purpose so you end up back at TP and turn in these quests
Go next to the sign, turn in WANTED: Overseer Maltorius
To the right of the tower, turn in Curse These Fat Fingers
Also turn in Fiery Menace!

steps.questName: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
steps.stepText: And turn in Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It as well
Go to the tent behind here, turn in STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere
Turn in Lookout's Spyglass
Turn in JOB OPPORTUNITY: Culling the Competition
Go to the next tent and finally turn in What The Flux?
You should be level 51 now
Turn in Forging the Shaft
Accept The Flame's Casing
Jump on the rock either with mount or jump in lava then on it. Open it for Release Them (Kill the Elites 1 by 1)
While killing these guys around the pool you should have found a Symbol of Ragnaros for The Flame's Casing if not kill until you do
Make sure you talk to the caged npc next to the lava, he gives you Prayer to Elune pt.1
Listen to his short story and turn in Prayer to Elune pt.1
Accept Prayer to Elune pt.2
Now you have to kill these for the Rag dropping and Prayer to Elune pt.2
Go down and turn in The Flame's Casing
Accept The Torch of Retribution pt.1
Then turn The Torch of Retribution pt.1 back in
Accept The Torch of Retribution pt.2
Then grab the torch in front of him and complete The Torch of Retribution pt.2
Accept Squire Maltrake
Turn Squire Maltrake back in
Accept Set Them Ablaze!
Now equip the staff and run to each of the 4 towers and run up and light the brazier for Set Them Ablaze!.
Go in the caves again and through the jail bar door and run to the room with the golem and touch the candle covered stone and turn in Release Them (SKIP the next part)
Die on purpose so you end up at TP
Go down and turn in Set Them Ablaze!
Open the chest on the ground accept Trinkets...
Then open it again and complete Trinkets...
Open it and keep the Black Dragonflight Molt for later In the Burning Steppes.
Fly to the Blasted Lands and run up into the Swamp of Sorrows
Go kill a named murloc Jarquia for Ledger From Tanaris
Hearth to IF
Either get a portal to Darnassus or fly to Menethil then boat to Auberdine and fly to Darn
Go to the top of the temple of the moon and turn in Prayer to Elune pt.2
Go to the next section up here and turn in Rise of the Silithid
Accept March of the Silithid
Go to the top of the tower and turn in Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
Accept Un'Goro Soil
Make Darnassus your home
Now either fly to Theramore or boat to Menethil then to Theramore
Get first aid up to 290 if you haven't for heavy runecloth bandages
Go to the wrecked ship and grab the overdue package for Ledger From Tanaris
Go to the cave and touch the scroll in the back of the cave which turns in Cortello's Riddle pt.2
Accept Cortello's Riddle pt.3
Aggro all the raptors and die so you end up at Theramore
Fly to Gadgetzan
Just as you enter Gadget, turn in Ledger From Tanaris
Between the 2 North gates accept Super Sticky
Go to the hut just west and turn in March of the Silithid
Accept Bungle in the Jungle
Run down into the Un'Goro Crater

Keep an eye out for the following items laying around the crafter: Power Crystals (need 7 of red,blue,green,yellow), Un'Goro Dirt Piles (get as many as you can), and Bloodpetal Sprouts: save in sets of 15
I tell you to grind through the raptors to find the item A Mangled Journal.
Follow the path down to the waterfall and accept The Apes of Un'Goro
Also accept The Fare of Lar'Korwi
Go over and click on the wrecked raft, accept It's A Secret to Everybody pt.1
Then take 2 steps under the water and turn in It's A Secret to Everybody pt.1
Accept It's A Secret to Everybody pt.2
Grind and get the meat off the big dinosaur for The Fare of Lar'Korwi
Go back and turn in The Fare of Lar'Korwi
Accept The Scent of Lar'Korwi
Grind west and there will be 2 spots with a bunch of eggs. Clear the raptors around it and stand on the eggs to get the mates to spawn for The Scent of Lar'Korwi
Once you have this done, go back and turn in The Scent of Lar'Korwi
Accept The Bait For Lar'Korwi
You should have found the jornal by now as well, if not keep grinding raptors till you get Williden's Journal
Go up the east side in the mountains, behind the east pylon. You'll see a big skeleton which is also the GY. Summon Lar'Korwi for The Bait For Lar'Korwi
Go and accept Chasing A-Me 01 and run up the path behind her into Marshal's Refuge.
Just to the left accept Shizzle's Flyer
Next to the left, a little bit back, accept Muigin and Larion
Next, near the sign accept Lost!
And on the sign accept Beware of Pterrordax
In front of the cave, accept Roll the Bones
If you have at least 15 bloodpetal sprouts, turn them in at the kodo for the repeatable quest Dadanga is Hungry!
To the right of the cave, accept Alien Ecology
To the right again, turn in Williden's Journal
Accept Expedition Salvation
Run just south a bit and you'll fine Linken just outside of a half hollow tree. Turn in It's A Secret to Everybody pt.2
Accept It's A Secret to Everybody pt.3
Get the Flightpoint to the right of the cave
Then go in the cave all the way to the end and accept Crystals of Power
Then turn in Crystals of Power
Accept The Northern Pylon
Accept The Eastern Pylon
And also accept The Western Pylon
Kill bloodpetals for Muigin and Larion when ever you see them
Kill diametradons and pterrodaxes for Shizzle's Flyer
Also kill them for Roll the Bones
Kill pterrodaxes and frenzied pterrodaxes for Beware of Pterrordax
Go east along the mountains and take that path up examine the pylon for The Northern Pylon
Go east and kill gorillas for The Apes of Un'Goro
Then go in the cave and stay right to turn in Chasing A-Me 01 (SKIP the next part for now)
Kill the tar monsters around the lakes for Super Sticky
There is also bloodpetals around here for Muigin and Larion
There is also diametradons and pterrodaxes for Shizzle's Flyer running around near them
Stop and grab the crate of foodstuff for Expedition Salvation
Try to collect all the stuff for Shizzle's Flyer out here
Go and follow the path up to the pylon for The Eastern Pylon
Go and turn in The Bait For Lar'Korwi
Also turn in The Apes of Un'Goro (SKIP the next part for now)
Grind the rest of the level
You should be Level 52 now
Just east of the volcano (center of map) there are pterrodaxes all for Beware of Pterrordax
Run west to a diametradon camp of about 5-6 Kill these if you need scales still for Shizzle's Flyer
Also kill them if Roll the Bones is not finished yet
Go west into the slithering scar, at the fork go left into the big room, stand in the middle, use the scraping vial for Alien Ecology
Run to the camp and grab the research equipment for Expedition Salvation
Kill frenzied pterrodaxes in the NW part of the map for Beware of Pterrordax
Go down and touch the western pylon for The Western Pylon
Go and accept Finding the Source
Go over to Fire Plume Ridge and kill elementals, try to avoid anything 56+ for Volcanic Activity (Leave blazing invaders alone)

Once you have that done, mount up towards the top of the volcano and use the thermometer for Finding the Source (There is more than one and it doesn't have to be at the top I see them at the bottom too)
Unless you need ashes still run and turn in Finding the Source
Accept The New Springs
Go up into the cave (in the same manner) and turn in Lost!

steps.questName: A Little Help From My Friends
steps.stepText: Accept A Little Help From My Friends

steps.questName: A Little Help From My Friends
steps.stepText: When you get him back to town run up near the sign by the cave and it will complete A Little Help From My Friends

steps.questName: A Little Help From My Friends
steps.stepText: Then turn in A Little Help From My Friends
Turn in Beware of Pterrordax
Turn in Shizzle's Flyer
Turn in Muigin and Larion (SKIP the rest)
Turn in Roll the Bones
Turn in Alien Ecology
Turn in Expedition Salvation
In the back of the cave turn in The Northern Pylon
Turn in The Eastern Pylon
Turn in The Western Pylon
Accept Making Sense of It
Then turn Making Sense of It back in. She then tells you about buffs from the pylons.
Follow the path into Slithus
Grab the Flightpoint
Fly to gadget.
Go to the NW part of town, turn in Bungle in the Jungle (SKIP the next part)
Then hand in Super Sticky between the 2 entrances
Hearth to Darnassus
Get new skills
You should have at least 50+ soils easy now.
Go and turn in Un'Goro Soil
Now go up to the top of the tower and accept Morrowgrain Research pt.1
Then go downstairs and turn in Morrowgrain Research pt.1
Accept Morrowgrain Research pt.2
Run through to Rut'theran Village and go in the house to the right and accept Moontouched Wildkin it's a winterspring feather quest
Fly to Astranaar
Then ride all the way east on the road which goes into Azshara
Just as you enter, on the right grab the Flightpoint
Just behind him, accept Spiritual Unrest
And also accept A Land Filled With Hatred
Go just north and kill all the ghosts around here until you complete Spiritual Unrest
Go just north and kill all the satyr's around here for A Land Filled With Hatred
Go back and turn in Spiritual Unrest
Also turn in A Land Filled With Hatred
Go and get the rubbings for Arcane Runes
Go and turn in The Hunter's Charm
Accept Courser Antlers
Grind the rest of the Level
You should be Level 53 now
Accept Cleansing Felwood
Run north a little bit and accept Forces of Jaedenar
Inside the house, accept The Corruption of the Jadefire
Under the tent accept Verifying the Corruption
And also accept To Winterspring!
Just across the road accept Timbermaw Ally
Go just SW of hereand kill the Furlbogs until you finish Timbermaw Ally
Just grind em all for rep until you're done
Go back and turn in Timbermaw Ally
Accept Speak to Nefian (The other is repeatable for rep)

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Go up near the 2 lakes and kill the cursed oozes for the first part of A Little Slime Goes A Long Way pt.1
Go to the west of here and kill the jadefire demons for The Corruption of the Jadefire. These are good to farm too.

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Go up and kill the tainted oozes for the second part of A Little Slime Goes A Long Way pt.1
Go just west of here and kill the Jaedenar for Forces of Jaedenar. You don't have to go in the caves.
Go back and turn in Forces of Jaedenar
Accept Collection of the Corrupt Water.
Inside the house turn in The Corruption of the Jadefire
Accept Further Corruption
Go back up to Jaedenar to the green pooland fill the canteen for Collection of the Corrupt Water
Go back and turn in Collection of the Corrupt Water
Accept Seeking Spiritual Aid
Go and kill Entropic beasts and horrors and explore the craters for Verifying the Corruption.
Go and follow it to the back, killing the demons for Further Corruption
When you kill Xavaric he'll drop a Flute of Xavaric which starts Flute of Xavaric.
Kill the satyr's now to complete Flute of Xavaric.
Run over to Irontree Cavern and kill 15 of the elementals and that should be enough for Cleansing Felwood
Go and get the Flightpoint
Go north and turn in Speak to Nefian
Accept Deadwood of the North
Now fall off the cliff to the west and start killing for Deadwood of the North
Once you're done you want to kill until you're 150 rep from the next rank with the timbermaw (put the rep as an xp bar for ease)
Go back and turn in Deadwood of the North and you should be unfriendly now and not aggro'd any longer.
Accept Speak to Salfa
Turn in any 5 sets of feathers for extra rep and 550 xp
Go through the cave to Winterspring and just outside the cave to the right turn in Speak to Salfa
Run south and turn in The New Springs
Accept Strange Sources
Also turn in It's A Secret to Everybody pt.3
Accept The Videre Elixir
Also accept Threat of the Winterfall
Run back throug the cave and go west at the fork into Moonglade.
Go and grab the Flightpoint
Grind the last few points of XP
You should be Level 54 now
Hearth to Astranaar
Fly to Feralas
Go in the Inn, accept Jonespyre's Request
Go up to the top of the tower and turn in Jonespyre's Request
Accept The Mystery of Morrowgrain
Turn The Mystery of Morrowgrain back in unless you're still making the stuff (If you don't have enough no big deal)
Go and buy a bait and read on how to get the videre elixir
Go and place the bait on the ground then go loot an everroot
Go back south to get your 3 videre elixir
Hearth to Astranaar
Run back up into Felwood and turn in Cleansing Felwood
Now she allows you to get stuff for some neat potions that are on different cooldowns than potions are.
Go and turn in Further Corruption
Also turn in Flute of Xavaric
Accept Felbound Ancients
Under the tent, turn in Verifying the Corruption
Go through the cave to Winterfall and just outside the cave accept Winterfall Activity
Turn in The Videre Elixir
Accept Meet at the Grave
Go and grab the Flightpoint
Fly to Rachet
Run west of the dock and turn in Volcanic Activity
Run down and turn in Seeking Spiritual Aid
Accept Cleansed Water Returns to Felwood
Fly to Theramore
Boat to Menethil then fly to IF
Just outside the military ward there should be a wandering npc. Grab the quest The New Frontier pt.1

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Go and turn in A Little Slime Goes A Long Way pt.1

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Accept A Little Slime Goes A Long Way pt.2
Go and turn in Return to Tymor (It was worth the run)
Fly to Menethil then boat to Theramore
Fly to Gadget
Get your mithril casing out of your bank or mailbox
Go east to the GY and drink your videre elixir
Now you're gonna die, don't rez just release and run north to turn in Meet at the Grave
Accept A Grave Situation
Go back and rez and touch the only tombstone there, turn in A Grave Situation
Accept Linken's Sword
Run into Un'Goro, I'd say fly but we have to go way SE
Accept The Mighty U'cha
Keep collecting dirt here if you need more morrowgrain

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Now all around the crater are slimes but you can find all the ones you need west of the volcano for A Little Slime Goes A Long Way pt.2
Go to the cave and go to the right, when you see A-Me 01 accept Chasing A-Me 01 pt.1
Turn Chasing A-Me 01 pt.1 back in
Fall over the edge and to the right and up around until you see U'cha for The Mighty U'cha
Run back to the front and go right again and accept Chasing A-Me 01 pt.2
Now escort her out to Marshal's
Turn in Chasing A-Me 01 pt.2
Go into Marshal's and turn in Linken's Sword
Accept A Gnome's Assistance
Go to the back of the cave and turn in A Gnome's Assistance
Accept Linken's Memory
Run down and let the tar monsters kill you so you're closer to the SE
Run down and turn in The Mighty U'cha. (You should be over half way to 55 now)
Hearth back to Astranaar
Fly to Darnassus
Go in the Temple of the Moon and fill the vial for Felbound Ancients
Run into Felwood
Turn in Cleansed Water Returns to Felwood
Accept Dousing the Flames of Protection
Go in the house, turn in Felbound Ancients
Accept Purified!
Then turn Purified! back in
Also turn in Linken's Memory
Accept Silver Heart
Start killing all the bears and wolves from here north until you have 11 silvery clawas for Silver Heart
Go into the cave and do Dousing the Flames of Protection
Continue past the room with candles surrounding the hole to the next open room for the 3rd and 4th brazier for Dousing the Flames of Protection
Run back outside and and kill the tree elementals for Silver Heart
Run All the way back down to turn in Dousing the Flames of Protection (SKIP the next part for now)
In the house turn in Silver Heart
Accept Aquementas
If you have skinning I'm sure you have at least 5 tainted hides, go down and turn them in for Salve via Skinning
Hearth to Astranaar
Fly to Winterspring
Go in Everlook accept Enraged Wildkin pt.1
Go in the Inn, make it your home

steps.questName: The Everlook Report Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff
steps.stepText: Accept The Everlook Report Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff
Also accept Sister Pamela
On the other side of town accept Are We There, Yeti? pt.1
Keep your eye out for those blue moonkin feathers to finish up Moontouched Wildkin
Run All the way south to complete Strange Sources
Hearth back to Everlook (If it's not up die on purpose)
Go and kill yeti's for Are We There, Yeti? pt.1
Run back to Everlook and turn in Are We There, Yeti? pt.1
Accept Are We There, Yeti? pt.2
Go back and kill matriarch's and patriarch's for Are We There, Yeti? pt.2 (There are a lot in the cave)
Run back to Everlook and turn in Are We There, Yeti? pt.2
Accept Are We There, Yeti? pt.3
Go just east of the Inn and scare Legacki for Are We There, Yeti? pt.3
Go east of Winterspring and kill the furlbogs there for Winterfall Activity
Also kill them for part of Threat of the Winterfall
Hopefully you'll find an Empty Firewater Flask on one of them which starts Winterfall Firewater
Run up to Starfall Village and turn in To Winterspring!
Accept The Ruins of Kel'Theril
Turn in Enraged Wildkin pt.1 (SKIP part 2 for now)
Also turn in The Ruins of Kel'Theril
Accept Troubled Spirits of Kel'Theril
Grab the relic for Troubled Spirits of Kel'Theril
Go west and kill furlbog here for Threat of the Winterfall
Also make sure you have your 10 feathers for Moontouched Wildkin
Go and turn in Strange Sources
Turn in Threat of the Winterfall
And also turn in Winterfall Firewater
Accept Falling to Corruption
Run over and turn in Winterfall Activity
You should be Level 55 (for a while) now
Run through the tunnel to Felwood
Go and touch the cauldron at the camp which turns in Falling to Corruption
Accept Mystery Goo
Hearth to Everlook
Fly to Darnassus
In Rut'theran Village turn in Moontouched Wildkin
Accept Find Ranshalla
Go into Darnassus in the big tower and turn in The New Frontier pt.1
Accept The New Frontier pt.2
Go down one floor and turn in The New Frontier pt.2
Accept Rabine Saturna
Fly to Moonglade
Turn in Rabine Saturna
Accept Wasteland
Fly to Auberdine
Boat to Menethil and fly to IF
Make Ironforge your home.
Make sure you have your black dragonflight molt

steps.questName: A Little Slime Goes A Long Way
steps.stepText: Go and turn in A Little Slime Goes A Long Way pt.2
Go in the throne room and accept The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan pt.1
Then click on her and listen to the story and turn The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan pt.1 back in
Accept The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan pt.2
In front of the Flightpoint accept Taking Back Silithus
Fly to Lakeshire
Run north and enter the Burning Steppes
Follow the path up and grab the Flightpoint
Accept Extinguish the Firegut
And also accept FIFTY! YEP!
In front of the broken house, accept Dragonkin Menace (This is the start of the ony key chain!)
Start killing ogres all over the mountain for Extinguish the Firegut
Then run back and turn in Extinguish the Firegut
Accept Gor'tesh the Brute Lord
Go NW to around and collect the ruins that look like tombstones for The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan pt.2
Go in the cave, turn in Yuka Screwspigot (SKIP the rest)
Outside accept Tablet of the Seven
Also accept Broodling Essence
Go and touch the dwarf statue for Tablet of the Seven
Go west to blackrock stronghold or south to the pillar of ash and kill the orcs for FIFTY! YEP! (They drop in large amounts)
While in the pillar of ash you should kill Gor'tesh for Gor'tesh the Brute Lord
Get a group if you can for Dragonkin Menace and then kill the mobs for it
Also get 8 of the broodlings for Broodling Essence by using the device on them before you attack them.
Go to the cave and accept A Taste of Flame
Then give him the molt and hand A Taste of Flame back in. (SKIP the next part)
Run back and turn in Tablet of the Seven
Also turn in Broodling Essence
Accept Felnok Steelspring
Ride back and next to the griffin turn in FIFTY! YEP!
Also turn in Gor'tesh the Brute Lord

steps.questName: Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
steps.stepText: Accept Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
In front of the broken house, turn in Dragonkin Menace
Accept The True Masters pt.1

steps.questName: Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
steps.stepText: Run up to the top of the mountin and click the soft dirt pile for Ogre Head On A Stick = Party

steps.questName: Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
steps.stepText: Then run back and turn in Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
Fly to Lakeshire
Run to the town hall and turn in The True Masters pt.1
Accept The True Masters pt.2
Fly to Stormwind
Go into the SW keep and turn in The True Masters pt.2
Accept The True Masters pt.3
Then talk to the lady and turn The True Masters pt.3 back in
Accept The True Masters pt.4
Fly back to Lakeshire and go to the townhall and turn in The True Masters pt.4
Accept The True Masters pt.5
Fly to the Burning Steppes
Turn in The True Masters pt.5 when you land
Accept The True Masters pt.6
Listen to ragged john for The True Masters pt.6
Then run back and turn in The True Masters pt.6 (SKIP the next part, do it later if you're worried about speed leveling).
Grind the rest of the Level
You should be Level 56 now
Hearth to IF
Go to the thrown room and turn in The Smoldering Ruins of Thaurissan pt.2
Get new skills
Fly to Menethil and boat to Theramore
Fly to Gadget
Go to the NW side of town and scare sprinkle for Are We There, Yeti? pt.3
Make gadget your home
To the south of lost rigger cove is a bunch of stones in a circle, Loot the stuff from the blue backpack and use the book to summon Aquementas
Hearth to gadget or die if it's not up yet.
Fly to Un'goro
Find Quixxil and scare him for Are We There, Yeti? pt.3
Go to the back of the cave and turn in Aquementas
Accept Linken's Adventure
And turn Linken's Adventure in just outside the cave by the big tree (SKIP the next part)
Fly to Silithus
Near the moonwell accept The Twilight Mystery
In front of the Inn, turn in Taking Back Silithus
Accept Securing the Supply Lines (SKIP the quest on the sign unless you get a group)
Make Cenarion Hold your home
Upstairs accept Deadly Desert Venom
Go do Securing the Supply Lines
Also do Deadly Desert Venom North and NE of town. Mobs for these 2 quests are all over this area.
Run up and turn in Wasteland
Accept The Spirits of Southwind
Run NW and pick up the twilight tablet fragments for The Twilight Mystery
Hearth to Cenarion Hold
Up stairs turn in Deadly Desert Venom
Accept Noggle's Last Hope
In front of the Inn, turn in Securing the Supply Lines
Accept Stepping Up Security
Go next to the moonwell and turn in The Twilight Mystery
Accept The Deserter
Go SE and kill the undead guys here for The Spirits of Southwind (Be careful when they die they spawn 1-2 bugs)
Kill the pincers for Noggle's Last Hope
Kill drudges for The Deserter south of here
Go to the cave and turn in The Deserter
Accept The Twilight Lexicon
You can find flayers and stalkers outside of the cave for Noggle's Last Hope
Hearth back to Cenarion Hold or die so you end up there
Go upstairs and turn in Noggle's Last Hope
Accept Noggle's Lost Satchel
Outside the Inn, turn in Stepping Up Security
Go and kill Twilight Keeper Manya for The Twilight Lexicon she fears a bit. She is south in the camp.
Go and kill Twilight Keeper Havanuth for The Twilight Lexicon he's on the east side of camp, he has a nasty aoe.

Go all the way down south to the little camp and go up the hill behind it, you'll find Deathclasp, in the middle of the path on the wall is a pouch, grab it when deathclasp is in the back for Noggle's Lost Satchel
Head over and kill Twilight Keeper Exeter for The Twilight Lexicon he's at the SW corner of camp
Go back to the cave and turn in The Twilight Lexicon
Accept A Terrible Purpose (He also offers another quest for 10 twilight texts, this is more for cen circle rep later on)
Turn in The Spirits of Southwind
Accept Hive in the Tower
Go to the top of the tower. Be careful 3 bugs spawn when you enter. Shift right click the pod because as soon as you open it some amushers spawn. Kill at least 1 and loot it for Hive in the Tower
Go and turn in Hive in the Tower
Accept Umber, Archivist
Hearth to Cenarion Hold
Go upstairs and turn in Noggle's Lost Satchel
Go into the long building and turn in A Terrible Purpose
Fly to Moonglade
And turn in Umber, Archivist
Accept Uncovering Past Secrets
Run over and turn in Uncovering Past Secrets. (You should now be 80-85% to 57)
Fly to Auberdine
Boat to Menethil then fly to IF
Make IF your home

steps.questName: A Call To Arms: The Plaguelands!
steps.stepText: Then find the wandering commander dwarf and accept A Call To Arms: The Plaguelands!
Fly to Southshore
Run north to the Alterac Mountains and into the Western Plaguelands (WPL)
Next to the shack accept A Plague Upon Thee pt.1
Grab the Flightpoint

Whenever you come back to camp here always check the vendor for the stormshroud pants recipe. It's like 1.3g and you can easily sell it for 10 or 20g+ It's a limited recipe that restocks 1 every hour.

steps.questName: A Call To Arms: The Plaguelands!
steps.stepText: Go to the tent and turn in A Call To Arms: The Plaguelands!
Accept Clear The Way
Go to the 3 Argent Dawn people near the other tent and turn in The Everlook Report

Also complete Argent Dawn Commission it's not a quest you had she just uses it to give you the trinket which you should always wear when in WPL and EPL because it gives you AD rep and allows the scourge tokens to drop (Save the tokens until I say to hand em in).
Go NE and grind the ghouls here until you got enough for Clear The Way
Go back to Chillwind Camp and turn in Clear The Way
Accept All Along the Watchtowers
Also accept The Scourge Cauldrons
Turn around and turn in The Scourge Cauldrons
Accept Target: Felstone Field
Grind your way back NE and over the bridge
Just in the town on the left is the 4th tower for All Along the Watchtowers. 1st tower is West of here. 2nd tower NE of here. 3rd tower NE of here, just behind this tower.
Go NW to Felstone field, kill Cauldron Lord Bilemaw for his cauldron key. Then go right click the cauldron and turn in Target: Felstone Field
Accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Theres 2 houses on the NE side of the field. Enter the northern house and go upstairs. Accept Better Late Than Never pt.1
Go in the barn next door and grab the box on the floor and turn in Better Late Than Never pt.1
Accept Better Late Than Never pt.2
Run back to Chillwind Camp and turn in All Along the Watchtowers
Accept Scholomance (SKIP the other unless you get about 10-20 people!)
Turn in Scholomance just behind him
Accept Skeletal Fragments Bones for this will take a while and drop off any skeletons.
Near the Flightpoint turn in Return to Chillwind Camp
Accept Target: Dalson's Tears
Go up to Dalson'Tears, kill Cauldron Lord Malvinious for his cauldron key. Then go right click the cauldron and turn in Target: Dalson's Tears
Accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Enter the barn here and Touch the diary on the floor and complete it, another quest that isn't a quest.
Go behind the barn and look for a Wandering Skeleton and get Dalson Outhouse Key off of him.
Use this to open the outhouse back here and kill Farmer Dalson and get his Dalson Cabinet Key.
Use the key on the locked cabinet upsairs in the house now next to the barn and complete the quest Locked Away
Go back to Chillwind Camp and turn in Return to Chillwind Camp
Accept Target: Writhing Haunt
Hearth to IF
Fly to SW
Go to the building on the 2nd floor of the cathedral area and turn in Better Late Than Never pt.2
Accept Good Natured Emma
Emma travels between the cathedral and the trade district, find her and turn in Good Natured Emma
Accept Good Luck Charm
Go into the keep and accept The First and the Last
Go and turn in The First and the Last
Accept Honor the Dead
Then turn Honor the Dead right back in
Accept Flint Shadowmore
Fly back to WPL
In front of the house turn in Flint Shadowmore
Accept The Eastern Plagues
Go back to Felstone field to the house upstairs and turn in Good Luck Charm
Accept Two Halves Become One

Go outside and look for a jabbering ghoul. You can't miss him he carry's a pitchfork. Keep clearing in front of the house until you find him. This will give you a good time to get those skeletal fragments
Combine the halves for Two Halves Become One
Go back upstairs and turn in Two Halves Become One
Go SE to Writhing Haunt, kill Cauldron Lord Razarch for his cauldron key. Then go right click the cauldron and turn in Target: Writhing Haunt
Accept Return to Chillwind Camp
In the house accept The Wildlife Suffers Too pt.1
Now go north of the haunt and kill the diseased wolves for The Wildlife Suffers Too pt.1.
Go back and turn in The Wildlife Suffers Too pt.1
Accept The Wildlife Suffers Too pt.2
Go back to Chillwind Camp and turn in Return to Chillwind Camp
Accept Target: Gahrron's Withering
Go just north of the Writhing Haunt between the mountains on the map and kill diseased grizzleys on your way for The Wildlife Suffers Too pt.2
Go NE to Gahrron's Withering, kill Cauldron Lord Soulwrath for his cauldron key. Then go right click the cauldron and turn in Target: Gahrron's Withering
Accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Go back and turn in The Wildlife Suffers Too pt.2
Accept Glyphed Oaken Branch
If you haven't finished Skeletal Fragments yet go to the crypt and kill the skeletons until you have 15 fragments
Go back to Chillwind Camp and turn in Return to Chillwind Camp
You should be Level 57 (for a while) now.
Turn around to the guy in front of the tent, and complete the quest Mission Accomplished!
To your right turn in Skeletal Fragments (SKIP the next part unless you want to start your Scholo key Questchain).
Run east and enter the Eastern Plaguelands (EPL)
Run up the west coast and accept Demon Dogs
Also accept Blood Tinged Skies
And finally accpet Carrion Grubbage (These are all annoying quests that can take a while).
Anytime from now until these are done, kill any plaguehound runts for Demon Dogs
Kill any carrion worms for Carrion Grubbage
And any plaguebat for Blood Tinged Skies (Grind all of them while you head to the next step).
Go over to the skeletons, open them and grab the insignia for The Eastern Plagues
Grind dogs and bats while you head to Darrowshire to the broken down house.
Turn in Sister Pamela
Accept Pamela's Doll
Then head towards the houses here, in any of the houses can be any of the 3 doll parts (They are random).
Once you have all 3 parts combine them and turn in Pamela's Doll
Accept Auntie Marlene
Also accept Uncle Carlin
Grind more plaguehounds, plaguebats and along the way
Head to Lightshope Chapel
Get the Flightpoint
Turn in Uncle Carlin
Accept Defenders of Darrowshire
Turn around and turn in Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff
Run SW and accept Zaeldarr the Outcast
Fly back to the EPL
In front of the house turn in The Eastern Plagues
Accept The Blightcaller Cometh
Grind the rest of the Level
You should be Level 58 now.
Hearth to IF
Fly to SW
Go to the keep and turn in The Blightcaller Cometh (SKIP the next part but it's a good quest to do at 60!)
Go get new skills
Fly back to WPL
Go NE to the house and go upstairs. Turn in Pamela's Doll
Accept A Strange Historian
Just north of the house and you'll see an off color gravestone. Loot it and get the wedding ring for A Strange Historian
Go in the west entrance to Andorhal and you should see the only full building. Go upstairs and turn in A Strange Historian
Accept The Annals of Darrowshire
Also accept A Matter of Time
Now look all around the city here for busted up silo's with a blue light coming out of them. Use the silo horn to summon the worms, it spawns 1-3 mobs for A Matter of Time.
Go to the Town Hall near all the mobs in the middle of town. Grab the books on the floor until you get the The Annals of Darrowshire. Some will spawn mobs
Go back to the Inn and to the top floor, turn in A Matter of Time
Accept Counting Out Time
Also turn in The Annals of Darrowshire
Accept Brother Carlin
Go outside and look around the busted houses for little metal lunchboxes for Counting Out Time
Go back to the Inn and turn in Counting Out Time you can now repeat this quest for a dampener. This is used vs the 61 elite
Run out of here and into EPL up to the NW and turn Demon Dogs in
Also turn in Blood Tinged Skies
And finally turn in Carrion Grubbage
Accept Redemption
Then listen to him and turn Redemption back in.
Then accept Of Forgotten Memories
Go to the Undercroft and run behind it. Touch the dirt pile to summon Mercutio and 3 guards. Loot his body for the hammer for Of Forgotten Memories
Now go to the bottom of the crypt and kill the very big troll for Zaeldarr the Outcast. Only grab the scroll on the floor if u want
Go back and turn in Of Forgotten Memories
Accept Of Lost Honor
Either Run to Light's Hope Chapel or back to Chillwind and fly there
Turn in Brother Carlin
Accept Villains of Darrowshire
Go and turn in Zaeldarr the Outcast
Go down just North of Corin's Crossing and grab the sword for Villains of Darrowshire
Don't forget to do some of Defenders of Darrowshire at Corin's. Just get what you can
Go north to Blackwood Lake and grab the skull under the water for Villains of Darrowshire
Go NE to aroundand kill the zombies for part of Defenders of Darrowshire
Go to the lake and grab the flag next to the cage, it's hard to see and is laying flat for Of Lost Honor
Go NW to the tower and turn in Troubled Spirits of Kel'Theril (SKIP the next part)
Run West and loot the termite mounds here for A Plague Upon Thee pt.1 until you get 100 termites
Also kill ghouls to finish up Defenders of Darrowshire
Run to Lights Hope Chapel now
Go by the tent and turn in Defenders of Darrowshire
Also turn in Villains of Darrowshire
Fly to WPL
Next to the house turn in A Plague Upon Thee pt.1
Accept A Plague Upon Thee pt.2
Run up and accept Unfinished Business pt.1
Start heading back SW and grind your way into the mill.
Right click the box and place the termintes, then click the barrel and turn in A Plague Upon Thee pt.2
Accept A Plague Upon Thee pt.3
Go just south and kill 2 knights and mages for Unfinished Business pt.1. Then for the hunters and medics
Go and turn in Unfinished Business pt.1
Accept Unfinished Business pt.2
Go and kill Huntsman Radly for Unfinished Business pt.2. Then north to the tower and kill Cavalier Durgen at the top
Go straight out of the tower over the mountains and turn in Unfinished Business pt.2 (3rd part is optional).
Run back straight south over the mountains and turn in Unfinished Business pt.3
Run into EPL and turn in Of Lost Honor
Accept Of Love and Family pt.1
Go back to WPL and run/swim to the island Scholo and turn in Of Love and Family pt.1 (SKIP the rest until you do strat)
Go back to Chillwind Camp and turn in A Plague Upon Thee pt.3
Now you want to grind 2 things here. Get friendly with Argent Dawn and get 8-8.5k from leveling.
You can accept Alas, Andorhal if you can find a group it's not that hard but can take 5-10 people. This will give you an easy 8300 xp instead of grinding.
Now you want to go up to andorhal and just grind until you're friendly, once you're friendly go back to Chillwind Camp and turn in all your scourge tokens.
His allows you to buy mana biscuits which restore mana and health and more than food can.
If you still need to level then go grind on mobs in andorhal again
You should be Level 59 now
Fly to Hinterlands
Run all the way NE to the waterfall and jump off.
Under the water loot the chest and finish Cortello's Riddle pt.3. I bet you thought I forgot about it
Hearth to IF
Go to the throne room and accept An Earnest Proposition (pick your class from the list) You have to have your classes tier 0 bracers in order to do this quest. You can buy it on AH
Fly to Menethil and boat to Auberdine
Fly to Darnassus
Go to the 2nd floor and turn in Glyphed Oaken Branch
Fly to Winterspring
On your left after entering turn in Are We There, Yeti? pt.3
Near the back are 2 horde, accept Luck Be With You
Turn around and turn in Felnok Steelspring
Accept Chillwind Horns
Do An Earnest Proposition just kill the sabers until you have 15 blood
Go just SE of here and kill the chimera's for Chillwind Horns
Run to Starfall Village and accept Enraged Wildkin pt.1
Turn in Chillwind Horns (SKIP the other unless you wanna go there)
Go south and touch the crate and turn in Enraged Wildkin pt.1
Accept Enraged Wildkin pt.2
Go back to the roat and touch the wagon, turn in Enraged Wildkin pt.2
Accept Enraged Wildkin pt.3
Grab the box in the snow
Run east again and turn in Find Ranshalla
Accept Guardians of the Altar
Now protect her while she does her thing for Guardians of the Altar. When she stops in a cave, light the torch for her.
If you don't get the feather for Enraged Wildkin pt.3 before you're done keep killing until you got it.
Go south and loot the gems for Luck Be With You (Needs a group).
Hearth to Everlook
Turn in Luck Be With You at the 2 horde near the back of everlook (You should be about 25% into 59 now).
Accept Cache of Mau'Ari if you want to. This just gives you an item which allows the mobs here to drop stuff which you can turn in for buffs
Go up to Starfall Village and turn in Enraged Wildkin pt.3
Run over and turn in Mystery Goo
Accept Toxic Horrors
Run into Felwood
Kill toxic horrors for Toxic Horrors these also drop essence of waters
Fly to Rut'theran Village and turn in Guardians of the Altar
Accept Wildkin of Elune
Go in Darnassus and up to the top of the tower turn in Wildkin of Elune
Fly back to Felwood
Run back up into Winterspring and turn in Toxic Horrors
Accept Winterfall Runners
Now to find the runners for Winterfall Runners. You don't have to kill all 3
Once you get the crate run turn in Winterfall Runners (SKIP the next part unless you get a group)
Hearth to Everlook
You should be 45-50% through 59. Now I make sure I got my mana bisquits and I start grinding until im 6600 to 60. Anywhere is fine where there is a lot of mobs It's all a matter of preference.
If you don't want to grind this large amount then do BRD, scholo, or strat. You have a lot of quests in those spots to do
Once you're 6600 to 60 fly to IF
Turn in An Earnest Proposition
You should be Level 60 now. GZ!
Party hard.
